alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 26 at 3:30AM MST until November 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...11 AM MST Sunday until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
